# Salesforce documentation context

> Salesforce PDF docs converted to Markdown for LLM context.

Update `src.txt`, then run `bun run update` to regenerate Markdown files in `documentation/` and refresh this list.

## Documentation
- [Salesforce apex developer guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Damecek/salesforce-documentation-context/main/documentation/salesforce-apex-developer-guide.md)
- [Salesforce apex reference guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Damecek/salesforce-documentation-context/main/documentation/salesforce-apex-reference-guide.md)
- [Salesforce DX Developer Guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Damecek/salesforce-documentation-context/main/documentation/sfdx_dev.md)
- [Sfdx dev](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Damecek/salesforce-documentation-context/main/documentation/sfdx-dev.md)
